00004 namespace sevent

00006     namespace serialize
00007     {
00008         enum Endianess {
00009             SEVENT_LITTLE_ENDIAN = 1, // Need to prefix because [LITTLE|BIG]_ENDIAN is a non-namespaced global on some systems.
00010             SEVENT_BIG_ENDIAN = 2,
00011             SEVENT_MIDDLE_ENDIAN = 3
00012         };
00013 
00015         Endianess myEndianess();
00016 
00017         //template<typename T> T endianSwap(T num);
00018         template<typename T> T endianSwap(T num)
00019         {
00020             // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1826159/swapping-two-variable-value-without-using-3rd-variable
00021             T result;
00022             uint8_t* in = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>(&num);
00023             uint8_t* out = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>(&result);
00024             uint8_t size = sizeof(T);
00025             for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00026             {
00027                 out[i] = in[size-i-1];
00028             }
00029             return result;
00030         }
00031     }
00032 } // namespace sevent
